title: Sydney Sightseeing
description: Explore the stunning landscapes and iconic landmarks of Sydney in this immersive excursion.
creator: wkp23@byu.edu

stops.name: Sydney Opera House
stops.description: Marvel at the architectural masterpiece and world-renowned performing arts venue.

stops.name: Royal Botanic Garden
stops.description: Stroll through lush gardens with breathtaking views of the Opera House and Harbour Bridge.

stops.name: Art Gallery of New South Wales
stops.description: Discover a diverse collection of art spanning various styles and time periods in this elegant gallery.

stops.name: Chinatown Sydney
stops.description: Experience the vibrant atmosphere of this bustling shopping and dining district.

stops.name: The Eye
stops.description: Take in panoramic views of the city from this iconic Sydney observation deck.

stops.name: Little Bay Beach
stops.description: Relax on the sandy shores of this picturesque beach just outside of Sydney.

stops.name: McDonalds
stops.description: Enjoy a quick bite to eat at this popular fast-food restaurant near the beach.

title: London Landmarks
description: Uncover the captivating history and culture of London through its most iconic landmarks on this guided excursion.
creator: wkp23@byu.edu

stops.name: Tower Bridge
stops.description: Admire the magnificent Victorian architecture of this iconic London landmark.

stops.name: Buckingham Palace
stops.description: Witness the grandeur of the official residence of the British monarch.

stops.name: The London Eye
stops.description: Enjoy stunning views of the city from this famous observation wheel.

stops.name: Big Ben
stops.description: Marvel at the iconic Gothic clocktower, a symbol of London, at the Houses of Parliament.

stops.name: Natural History Museum
stops.description: Explore fascinating exhibits of animals and natural phenomena at this renowned museum.

title: Rome Routes
description: Delve into the ancient wonders of Rome and journey through its most remarkable routes on this guided excursion.
creator: wkp23@byu.edu

stops.name: Colosseum
stops.description: Step back in time at the iconic ancient Roman amphitheater and marvel at its impressive architecture.

stops.name: Roman Forum
stops.description: Discover the heart of ancient Rome and explore the ruins of its political and social center.

stops.name: Trevi Fountain
stops.description: Admire the grandeur of this iconic Baroque fountain, a symbol of romance and beauty.

stops.name: Pantheon
stops.description: Explore the ancient temple dedicated to the gods of Rome, now a historic church.

stops.name: Vatican City
stops.description: Visit the world's smallest sovereign state and marvel at the breathtaking art and architecture.

stops.name: Piazza Navona
stops.description: Wander through the charming square, famous for its Baroque architecture, fountains, and street performers.

stops.name: Spanish Steps
stops.description: Climb the iconic staircase and enjoy picturesque views of the surrounding neighborhood.

title: Destinations in Delhi
description: Embark on a journey through Delhi's vibrant history and culture, visiting its top attractions on this guided tour.
creator: Excursions

stops.name: India Gate
stops.description: Admire the towering war memorial dedicated to the Indian soldiers who lost their lives in World War I.

stops.name: Qutub Minar
stops.description: Discover the ancient minaret, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, surrounded by historical ruins.

stops.name: Humayun's Tomb
stops.description: Explore the stunning Mughal architecture of this historic tomb, also a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

stops.name: Lotus Temple
stops.description: Visit the captivating Bahá'í House of Worship, known for its unique lotus-shaped design.

stops.name: Red Fort
stops.description: Step into the historic Mughal fortress, a symbol of India's rich history and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

stops.name: Jama Masjid
stops.description: Experience the grandeur of India's largest mosque, an architectural masterpiece in the heart of Old Delhi.

stops.name: Akshardham Temple
stops.description: Witness the breathtaking beauty of this Hindu temple complex, showcasing traditional Indian culture and architecture.

title: Tokyo Tour
description: Delight in the bustling streets and enchanting neighborhoods of Tokyo on this thrilling guided tour.
creator: Excursions

stops.name: Shibuya Crossing
stops.description: Experience the world's busiest pedestrian crossing, a symbol of Tokyo's energetic atmosphere.

stops.name: Meiji Shrine
stops.description: Discover the tranquility of this Shinto shrine, dedicated to Emperor Meiji and Empress Shoken.

stops.name: Asakusa and Senso-ji Temple
stops.description: Wander through the charming Asakusa district and visit the ancient Senso-ji Temple, a significant Buddhist site.

stops.name: Akihabara
stops.description: Dive into the heart of Japanese pop culture in this vibrant district, famous for its electronics, anime, and manga stores.

stops.name: Tsukiji Fish Market
stops.description: Explore the world's largest seafood market, where you can find a variety of fresh fish, sushi, and other Japanese delicacies.

stops.name: Ueno Park
stops.description: Stroll through the lush greenery of this spacious park, home to multiple museums, a zoo, and beautiful cherry blossom trees.

stops.name: Tokyo Skytree
stops.description: Admire the panoramic views of Tokyo from the tallest tower in the world, featuring an observation deck and a sky-high restaurant.

title: Bold Barcelona
description: Discover the bold and vibrant personality of Barcelona's streets and landmarks on this exciting excursion.
creator: Excursions

stops.name: Sagrada Família
stops.description: Marvel at the stunning architecture of this iconic basilica designed by Antoni Gaudí, a masterpiece still under construction.

stops.name: Park Güell
stops.description: Wander through this enchanting park, showcasing Gaudí's unique architectural style and vibrant mosaic designs.

stops.name: Casa Batlló
stops.description: Explore one of Gaudí's most famous creations, a whimsical modernist building with a colorful facade and extraordinary interior.

stops.name: La Rambla
stops.description: Stroll along this bustling pedestrian boulevard, lined with shops, restaurants, and street performers.

stops.name: Gothic Quarter
stops.description: Wander through the narrow medieval streets of this historic neighborhood, filled with charm and hidden gems.

stops.name: Barceloneta Beach
stops.description: Relax and soak up the sun at this popular urban beach, offering a lively atmosphere and beautiful views.

stops.name: Magic Fountain of Montjuïc
stops.description: Be mesmerized by the colorful light and water show at this impressive fountain, set to music on select evenings.

title: Partugal's Pathways
description: Experience the beauty and charm of Portugal's stunning pathways and hidden gems on this guided excursion.
creator: Excursions

stops.name: Belém Tower
stops.description: Admire the architectural beauty of this historic fortress, an iconic symbol of Portugal's Age of Discovery.

stops.name: Jerónimos Monastery
stops.description: Explore the impressive Gothic architecture and beautiful cloisters of this UNESCO World Heritage Site.

stops.name: Alfama District
stops.description: Wander through the narrow, winding streets of Lisbon's oldest neighborhood, full of history and charm.

stops.name: Pena Palace
stops.description: Visit this colorful Romanticist palace perched on a hilltop in Sintra, offering stunning views and lush gardens.

stops.name: Douro Valley
stops.description: Take in the breathtaking scenery of this picturesque wine region, known for its terraced vineyards and serene river.

stops.name: Livraria Lello
stops.description: Step into this stunning, historic bookstore in Porto, featuring ornate wood carvings and a striking red staircase.

stops.name: Praça do Comércio
stops.description: Relax in this expansive riverside square in Lisbon, surrounded by vibrant yellow buildings and lively cafes.

title: Rio Ride
description: Feel the rhythm and energy of Rio de Janeiro's bustling streets and exciting attractions on this exciting excursion.
creator: Excursions

stops.name: Christ the Redeemer
stops.description: Take in the breathtaking views from the base of this iconic statue, standing tall atop Corcovado Mountain.

stops.name: Sugarloaf Mountain
stops.description: Ride a cable car to the summit of this iconic peak, offering panoramic views of Rio de Janeiro and its coastline.

stops.name: Copacabana Beach
stops.description: Stroll along the golden sands of this famous beach, lined with shops, restaurants, and buzzing with activity.

stops.name: Ipanema Beach
stops.description: Soak up the sun and vibrant atmosphere at this popular beach, famous for its stunning views and lively scene.

stops.name: Escadaria Selarón
stops.description: Climb the colorful steps of this unique staircase, adorned with vibrant tiles from around the world by artist Jorge Selarón.

stops.name: Jardim Botânico
stops.description: Stroll through the lush, serene landscapes of this expansive botanical garden, home to a vast array of plant species.

stops.name: Lapa Arches
stops.description: Marvel at the impressive architecture of these historic arches, which once served as an aqueduct and now host lively events and nightlife.

title: Sunny San Francisco
description: Experience the sunny and laid-back vibe of San Francisco's most popular destinations on this guided tour.
creator: Excursions

stops.name: Golden Gate Bridge
stops.description: Admire the iconic, red suspension bridge that spans the entrance to the San Francisco Bay, offering breathtaking views of the city and the bay.

stops.name: Fisherman's Wharf
stops.description: Wander through this bustling waterfront area, filled with delicious seafood restaurants, shops, and historic attractions.

stops.name: Alcatraz Island
stops.description: Explore the infamous former federal prison that housed notorious criminals like Al Capone, and enjoy stunning views of the bay.

stops.name: Union Square
stops.description: Visit the bustling shopping, dining, and entertainment district at the heart of San Francisco.

stops.name: Lombard Street
stops.description: Navigate the famous winding, steep street known for its eight hairpin turns and beautiful landscaping.

stops.name: Coit Tower
stops.description: Climb to the top of this iconic tower for panoramic views of San Francisco and the surrounding bay.

stops.name: Palace of Fine Arts
stops.description: Discover this beautiful, Greco-Roman-style landmark, which showcases a stunning lagoon, colonnades, and peaceful gardens.

title: Berlin's Boroughs
description: Explore the diverse neighborhoods of Berlin, from trendy cafes and street art in Kreuzberg to historic landmarks in Mitte.
creator: Excursions

stops.name: Brandenburg Gate
stops.description: Visit the iconic symbol of Berlin, which has served as a backdrop to many historic events and now represents unity and peace.

stops.name: East Side Gallery
stops.description: Explore the longest remaining section of the Berlin Wall, now transformed into a vibrant canvas for street art.

stops.name: Reichstag Building
stops.description: Discover the historic and architecturally impressive building that houses the German Parliament, offering a glass dome with panoramic views of the city.

stops.name: Pergamon Museum
stops.description: Explore this world-renowned museum, which houses an impressive collection of ancient art and architecture, including the Pergamon Altar and the Ishtar Gate.

stops.name: Checkpoint Charlie
stops.description: Visit the famous Cold War-era crossing point between East and West Berlin, now featuring a museum dedicated to its history.

stops.name: Alexanderplatz
stops.description: Explore this bustling public square in the heart of Berlin, which features the iconic Fernsehturm TV tower, World Clock, and numerous shops and restaurants.

stops.name: Mauerpark
stops.description: Stroll through this vibrant park, known for its lively atmosphere, Sunday flea market, and colorful graffiti-covered remnants of the Berlin Wall.
